import React from 'react'; import { useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Layout } from '../components/layout/Layout'; import { mockFacilities, mockESGData } from '../utils/mockData'; import { Building, MapPin, User, TrendingUp, ArrowLeft, Calendar, Leaf, Users, Shield, Download, FileText, Activity, Factory, Zap, Flame, Gauge } from 'lucide-react'; import { BarChart, Bar, LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, RadarChart, PolarGrid, PolarAngleAxis, PolarRadiusAxis, Radar } from 'recharts'; export const FacilityDetail: React.FC = () => { const { facilityId } = useParams<{ facilityId: string }>(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const facility = mockFacilities.find(f => f.id === facilityId); const esgData = facilityId ? mockESGData[facilityId] : null; if (!facility || !esgData) { return (

Facility not found

 ); } const getScoreColor = (score: number) => { if (score >= 90) return 'text-latspace-dark'; if (score >= 70) return 'text-latspace-medium'; return 'text-latspace-light'; }; // Prepare data for charts const monthlyData = [ { month: 'Jan', emissions: 450, energy: 320, water: 280 }, { month: 'Feb', emissions: 420, energy: 310, water: 270 }, { month: 'Mar', emissions: 380, energy: 295, water: 260 }, { month: 'Apr', emissions: 360, energy: 285, water: 250 }, { month: 'May', emissions: 340, energy: 275, water: 240 }, { month: 'Jun', emissions: 320, energy: 265, water: 230 } ]; const radarData = [ { metric: 'Emissions', value: 85, fullMark: 100 }, { metric: 'Energy', value: 78, fullMark: 100 }, { metric: 'Water', value: 92, fullMark: 100 }, { metric: 'Waste', value: 70, fullMark: 100 }, { metric: 'Safety', value: esgData.social.safety, fullMark: 100 }, { metric: 'Diversity', value: esgData.social.diversity, fullMark: 100 } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

{facility.name} Cement Plant

{facility.location}
Capacity: {facility.capacity} {facility.type.toUpperCase()} PLANT
{facility.company && (
{facility.company}
)}
Plant Head: {facility.manager}
Updated: {new Date(facility.lastUpdated).toLocaleDateString()}
{facility.esgScore}
ESG Score
{facility.esgScore >= 90 ? 'EXCELLENT' : facility.esgScore >= 70 ? 'GOOD' : 'NEEDS IMPROVEMENT'}
{/* Quick Stats */}

Completion

{facility.dataCompleteness}%

Employees

{esgData.social.employees}

Compliance

{esgData.governance.compliance}%

Reports

12

{/* ESG Breakdown */}

ENVIRONMENTAL

Emissions (tons CO2) {esgData.environmental.emissions}
Energy (MWh) {esgData.environmental.energy}
Water (gallons) {esgData.environmental.water}
Waste (tons) {esgData.environmental.waste}

SOCIAL

Safety Score {esgData.social.safety}%
Community Score {esgData.social.community}%
Diversity Score {esgData.social.diversity}%
Total Employees {esgData.social.employees}

GOVERNANCE

Compliance {esgData.governance.compliance}%
Ethics Score {esgData.governance.ethics}%
Transparency {esgData.governance.transparency}%
Board Diversity {esgData.governance.boardDiversity}%
{/* Charts */}

Environmental Trends (6 Months)

ESG Performance Overview

{/* Actions */}

Actions

); };
